APPROVE_TOKEN_TOOLTIP: <0>My approved tokens</0> - amount (in ERC20 tokens) authorized by users for use in the D4X protocol. Smart contracts can access the approved amount to create positions or deposit into the pool, following protocol algorithms.

METAMASK_NOT_FOUND.TITLE: The token has not been added
METAMASK_NOT_FOUND.SUB_TITLE: Please use the browser in metamask application to add token

ADD_CHAINS.TITLE: Add chains
ADD_CHAINS.NO_METAMASK: Please use the browser in metamask application to add chains

LIMIT_ERROR.TITLE: Oops!
LIMIT_ERROR.SUB_TITLE: This action can't be done because D4X protocol version 1.4 has limits and is just for testing. Try smaller amounts!
